Name: EVDemoSendingAnd3EmbeddedSigners
Landing description: Discover how to pre-fill and send a purchase agreement to the agent and buyers using the airSlate SignNow API. Complete the agreement in multiple roles and download the fully executed document.
steps: Step 1: User fills a six‑field form (agent + 2 signers) and clicks Continue. Step 2: Server clones the template (ID 34009a3d21b5468d86d886cd715658c453335c61) and maps e‑mails to roles. Step 3: Names for Signer 1 and Signer 2 are pre‑filled in the document. Step 4: Embedded invites are created with signing order Agent → Signer 1 → Signer 2. Step 5: Agent signs inside the iframe; browser auto‑redirects to Signer 1, then to Signer 2 after each completion. Step 6: After the last signature the Finish page appears and lets the user download the signed PDF.
